ProjectTitle: CXCL9-derived peptides for treatment of pneumonia induced by microbial infection
InitialFeedbackHistory:
19/04/2024
Data: please use the table in the template to list your datasets with their details. The use of data from previous project is considered reuse of existing data, if you use this kind of data please add this (relevant for next questions) . 
Ethics: you list ethical approvals that are already a bit older, are these ongoing studies, or are you reusing the data/materials collected in the past, if so do these include the use of the data/materials for this research question/project? You also mention that you receive data with a code that can still be linked with the patient by the physician, this means the data is not anonymous but pseudonymous with is still personal data according to the GDPR, do the ethical approvals include privacy? if not please register the processing of personal data via PRET, for more information see: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/studpers/index
Storage/preservation; You mention many different storage solutions, some of them are not very secure (PC, Hard drives) but this also makes it difficult to keep track of the locations an versions of the different datasets, can you use a KU Leuven storage solution with automatic backup? For more information see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
